content: **knitted jumper with short sleeves in drops melody piece is knitted top down with raglan size xs xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-051 yarn group d ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 100-150-150-150-150-150 g colour 17 strong pink **knitting gauge ** 12 stitches in width and 14 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 8 mm drops circular needle size 8 mm length 40 and 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 6 mm drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 and 60 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
